backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing products, sales, and a dashboard summary with CRUD for products and inventory updates during sales.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping frontend files to implemented features and associated components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file for inventory, sales, and dashboard UI.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variables defining color tokens and dark mode palettes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React router setup defining routes for dashboard, inventory, record sale, and sales history inside the app layout.
frontend/src/components/inventory/Adjust: Dialog UI for adjusting product stock, currently showing an error due to missing backend stock-adjustment method.
frontend/src/components/inventory/Delete: Confirmation dialog for deleting a product, placeholder until backend delete method exists.
frontend/src/components/inventory/Produc: Dialog for adding or editing products; creation works, updates require a missing backend update method.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Defines the main app layout with header, navigation (desktop and mobile), content container, and footer.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useDashboard.ts: Fetches dashboard summary data using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, manages login/logout, identity loading, and wraps the app with an authentication provider.
frontend/src/hooks/useProducts.ts: Provides hooks for fetching products, fetching a single product, and creating new products with cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useSales.ts: Provides a mutation hook to record a sale and refresh related queries.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration defining color variables, themes, and base styles.
frontend/src/lib/queryKeys.ts: Defines react-query key constants for products, sales, dashboard, and related data.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Provides a utility function to merge class names using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Displays dashboard metrics, low-stock alerts, and handles loading and error states via useDashboard.
frontend/src/pages/InventoryPage.tsx: Displays product inventory with search, add/edit, stock adjustment, and delete actions using dialogs and product data hooks.
frontend/src/pages/RecordSalePage.tsx: Provides a UI to build and submit sales with line items, product selection, quantity validation, and total calculation.
frontend/src/pages/SalesHistoryPage.tsx: Placeholder page showing sales history is unavailable until backend sales endpoints are implemented.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme, colors, animations, and plugin setup for the frontend UI.
project_state.json: Defines project metadata, feature list, image requirements, and current development state.
